name: files_list
description: List for a team, in a channel, or from a user with applied filters.

user.description: Filter files created by a single user.

channel.description: Filter files appearing in a specific channel, indicated by its ID.

ts_from.description: Filter files created after this timestamp (inclusive).

ts_to.description: Filter files created before this timestamp (inclusive).

types.description: Filter files by type ([see below](#file_types)). You can pass multiple values in the types argument, like `types=spaces,snippets`.The default value is `all`, which does not filter the list.

show_files_hidden_by_limit.description: Show truncated file info for files hidden due to being too old, and the team who owns the file being over the file limit.
